Export.Routine:
WWWFORM31A(YGETDATA,YLFDAT) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; AKTIVSCHALTUNG BEARBEITUNGSFELD ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 07-Jan-2011 GRF SR17579: Use explicit tag for WWWTR calls ; 06.02.2004 FIS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YRETVAL,YHTML,YVALUE,YBBN,YINHALT,YEXEC,YDATEI
set YRETVAL="" set YLFDAT = $get(YLFDAT) ;FIELDNUMBER set YBBN = $piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) ;FORMULARFELDNUMMER set YDATEI = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) if +$get(YGETDATA)'=0 do quit YRETVAL ;HOLEN DATEN ;send for . set YHTML=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCESELECT",YBBN,YGETDATA,1)) . set YHTML=$$^WWWTRANSLATE($$^WWWTRANSLATE(YHTML,"<","_ASCII60_"),">","_ASCII62_") . if YHTML'="" do . . set YHTML=$$ESC^WWWENCODE(YHTML) . . set YRETVAL=YHTML
if YLFDAT'="" if +YBBN'=0 if YDATEI'="" do . new YTXT,YLFN,YTYP,REL,PARA,RELF,SUCH,YFIELDNAME,YLENGTH,YWIDTH,YCOLON,YCOLOFF,YVALIGN,YPADDING,YHEIGHT,YFONT,YFONTSIZE . set YFIELDNAME=YLFDAT . do PARA^WWWFORM31("D",YBBN) ;SET PARAMETER ;table-mat parameter . quit:YFTYPE="" . if YFTYPE="INPUT" if YVALIGN=" text-align:right;" set YPADDING=" padding-right:4px;" ;ZZGL. RAHMENSTÃ„RKE . ; . set YINHALT=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE",YLFDAT,1)) ;INHALT ;purport . set YTEXT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,YINHALT) . if YTYP=2 set YTEXT=+YTEXT ;FIS;31.08.04;26346 . set YHTML="" . if YFTYPE="SELECT" kill ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCESELECT",YBBN) . set YEXEC="SET YHTML=$$"_YFTYPE_"^WWWFORM31F()" xecute YEXEC . ; . ;set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCETYPE",YFIELDNAME,1)=YFTYPE . if YHTML'="" do . . set YHTML = $$ESC^WWWENCODE(YHTML) . . set YINHALT = $$ESC^WWWENCODE(YINHALT) . . set YRETVAL = "#FUNCTION~activateFieldNow("_""""_YLFDAT_""""_","_""""_YHTML_""""_","_""""_YINHALT_""""_");" . ; . if YHTML="" do . . set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~activateFieldNow("_""""_YLFDAT_""""_","_""""_""""_","_""""_YINHALT_""""_",1);"
quit YRETVAL
